channel.title: Education on Minko Gechev's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Education on Minko Gechev's blog

item.title: Advanced JavaScript at Sofia University
item.description: In this blog post Iâ€™ll tell few words about the course Advanced JavaScript which Georgi Penkov, Evgeni Kunev and me are leading this semester in Sofia University. I was included as a lecturer in it after my project for Practical Programming with Perl (plainvm) which is created by Georgi Penkov. The idea behind the course is not to concentrate on the syntax of JavaScript but to introduce to the students different modern technologies.
